did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Scrapbook of photographs, clippings, letters and programs related to the White family and Bisbee, Arizona. Manuscript: History of Bisbee's Miner Poet, by M. (W.) McKinney. Typescript volume of poems by Edward (Ned) White.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Edward Patrick White Scrapbook (AZ 321). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Marian White McKinney, 1972.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of photographs, clippings, letters and programs related to the White family and Bisbee, Arizona. Manuscript: History of Bisbee's Miner Poet, by M. (W.) McKinney. Typescript volume of poems by Edward (Ned) White.
Scrapbook was compiled by author's daughter Marian (White) McKinney.

relatedmaterial.p: Some poems published in: White, Ned. Westland Echoes. Bisbee, Ariz.: Bisbee Ore Press, 1916.
